title: Necklace of the eight Buddhist emblems
description:
5 pieces: Necklace, Necklace, Religious Piece, Necklace Collar and Medallion
3 NECKLACES ARE NUMBERED 64.59 Buddhist Collar KK
ceremonial, silver, semi-precious stone inlays and beads. Several loose beads. Comprised of four parts.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Ernest A. Heilman
